title: Joseph: His Arms Were Made Strong
description: Joseph, His Arms Were Made Strong takes up and illustrates many truth vital for Christian living. It is not only a good read but will be spiritually beneficial to both young and old. It is relevant to contemporary trends and opinions both in society and the church. It draws upon long pastoral experience and is full of down-to-earth examples. What is unusual but refreshing about the book is the author's directness in addressing the reader and his asking some personal questions. This underlines the helpfulness of the lessons drawn from Joseph's life and makes the reading a stimulus and guide to spiritual growth and personal holiness.
author: David C. Searle
